overview: Once upon a time a little girl grew up to be a very stacked young lady...When, Lilly, called Dirty Lilly by her friends, got too big and too hot for her mother to handle she was thrown out into the world on her own. So begins her search for Daddy, who left Mommy so many years ago.
tagline: Lolita Teased, Candy Tempted, Now Lilly Delivers.
title: Dirty Lily
